resources.string:
Welcome to WordZap 0.3 !

- Click on 'WordZap' to start the game
- Use '+' and '-' to select a difficulty level.

Have fun !

Developed by Kowshik Prakasam

kowshik@gmail.com

GitHub : http://github.com/kowshik/WordZap/

If you are interested in contributing to this project, then please contact me
